scripts.gc:list:aws: docker run -w /app/output  --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output --env-file=aws.env grucloud-cli --infra /app/input/iac_aws.js list --json gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:azure: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output --env-file=azure.env grucloud-cli --infra iac_azure.js  info --provider azure --config input/config_azure.js
scripts.gc:list:azure: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  --env-file=azure.env grucloud-cli --infra iac_azure.js list -p azure --config input/config_azure.js --json output/gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file output/gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:gcp: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_google.js  info --provider google --config input/config_google.js
scripts.gc:list:gcp: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud-cli --infra iac_google.js list -p google --config input/config_google.js --json output/gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file output/gc.dot
